thread.title: Video: watch David Tennant's terrifying performance in Jessica Jones' nemesis in Netflix trailer
thread.title_full: Video: watch David Tennant's terrifying performance in Jessica Jones' nemesis in Netflix trailer (From Herald Scotland)

author: Jill Castle
title: Video: watch David Tennant's terrifying performance in Jessica Jones' nemesis in Netflix trailer
text:
Comic book fans have been given their first glimpse of David Tennant as a villain in the new Netflix Marvel series.
Tennant has dropped his Scottish accent in favour of an English twang for his portrayal of 'The Purple Man', AKA Dr Zebediah Kilgrave in Jessica Jones.
The new teaser shows Jessica Jones, played by Krysten Ritter, putting up photographs on her pinboard which comes to life as Tennant speaks.
Picture perfect. #JessicaJones https://t.co/xlHpi5oJYC
â€” Jessica Jones (@JessicaJones) October 8, 2015 Kilgrave had the power to persuade his enemies to do his bidding in the original comics.
Share article The first season of Jessica Jones will premiere on Netflix on Friday, November 20.
